boost::sql_cli::null_data

boost::sql_cli::null_data Class Reference

#include <boost/sql_cli/error.hpp>

Inherits boost::sql_cli::error.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Exception class that represents a generic SqlCli error. Represents null values in context where they should not be ignored. This may be thrown when retrieving a null value in an object that is not suitable to represent it (i.e. it is neither a boost::optional<> nor a sql_cli::null_value<>).
